document.full_text: randy couture was denied a storybook ending to his ultimate fighting championship career on saturday when he was knocked out in his final fight, but the 47-year-old walked away from the octagon with his legacy intact.
document.title: ufc a knockout as couture gets rousing send off
lines_and_colors: randy couture was denied a storybook ending to his ultimate fighting championship career on saturday when he was knocked out in his final fight, but the 47-year-old walked away from the octagon with his legacy intact.
